headline: Anti-Aging Products Research Report 2025: A $78.34 Billion Market by 2030, Fueled by Advancements in Clean Beauty, Preventive Skincare, and Targeted Product Innovation
summary: The global anti-aging products market is forecast to grow at a CAGR of 6.96% from 2024 to 2030. Growth is driven by technological advancements, clean beauty trends, and personalization demand. The market additionally benefits from rising men's grooming, an aging population, early preventive skincare, and digital engagement. Key collaborations, such as Beiersdorf with Rubedo Life Sciences and Estee Lauder with Serpin Pharma, aim to accelerate innovation. North America holds the largest market sha

headline: Aussie Dares to Wonder: New Ultra Wonder Collection Brings Premium Multi-Tasking Curl Care to Mass Market
summary: CINCINNATI, November 24, 2025--Aussie is redefining curl care with the launch of Ultra Wonder, breaking the rules and challenging the notion that great hair requires a dozen products and hours of styling. As the brand's first premium innovation, the three-product collection—Ultra Wonder Daily Mist, Ultra Wonder Treatment, and Ultra Wonder Gel Crème (each $9.99) — merges the benefits of treatments and stylers in single formulas, inviting consumers to "Dare to Wonder" and simplify their routines w

headline: EXCLUSIVE: Sustainable Value Creation: Keynote Fireside with Trian Fund Management, 5th Palm Beach CorpGov Forum
summary: CorpGov and IPO Edge are pleased to provide complete video coverage of the fifth annual Palm Beach CorpGov Forum held on Nov. 5-6, featuring keynote speaker Josh Frank, Partner and Co-Chief Investment Officer at Wall Street legend Nelson Peltz’s Trian Fund Management.
